reviewText: This is an adorable DVD that runs just over an hour featuring the Lalaloopsy girls.  Whether you have a new Lalaloopsy fan or a current one, this would be a great addition to any child's collection.  It is broken down into four episodes, perfect to stop after one or watch a few at a time.  They are episodes that your child might have seen already on television but it is great to have four combined for this DVD to watch anytime.  The show is wholesome and a typical girl show where the girls work together, solve problems and of course look fabulous doing it.  The recommend age on it is 3 and up.
My daughter LOVES this video. She has watched it everyday for the past three days several times a day.  LOVES IT!
Great price with some really cute episodes.
My 4 year old daughter loves this movie! She has watched it at least 10 times.  She also enjoyed the threading game it came with!
Came early and daughter loves it !
Even as an adult i can get into this with my kids.  Great learning experience.
Great buy! Good condition! Came on time! My daughter is going to love it!
My granddaughter loves it, she is 3
DVD is a bunch of shows that she never gets to watch when they are on TV. She is happy and loves them.
